edu.uw.cs.cse461.sp12.util
Class ByteStuffingFramer

java.lang.Object
  edu.uw.cs.cse461.sp12.util.ByteStuffingFramer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteStuffingFramer.Decoder, ByteStuffingFramer.Encoder
public class ByteStuffingFramer
extends java.lang.Object

Provides Encoder and Decoder nested classes to encode/decode into/outof an HDLC-like frame. The frame looks like

FLAGDataCRC32FLAG

The user configures the values of the FLAG and ESCAPE (used to encode data) bytes, as well as the maximum length of the Data field.

Constructor Detail

ByteStuffingFramer

protected ByteStuffingFramer(byte flagByte,
                             byte escapeByte,
                             int frameDataLength)
The frameDataLength argument is the maximum number of data bytes in the frame. The full length is therefore no greater than frameDataLength + 2 (FLAG bytes) + 4 (CRC32).

flagByte -
escapeByte -
